transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the caller to a specified address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the owner.

approve.description: Approves a spender to spend a certain amount of tokens on behalf of the owner.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance granted to a spender.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance granted to a spender.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given initial owner, treasury, and foundation addresses.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from the caller.

burnFrom.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens from a specified address.

eip712Domain.description: Returns the EIP-712 domain separator and related information.

lastMintTimestamp.description: Returns the timestamp of the last mint operation.

mint.description: Mints a specified amount of tokens to a specified address.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

nonces.description: Returns the nonce for a specified address.

owner.description: Returns the current owner of the contract.

pendingOwner.description: Returns the address of the pending owner.

permit.description: Allows a spender to spend tokens on behalf of the owner using a signed permit.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of the token.
